column5: Weatherman promised us some beautifull weather and they got it right.7c out and awesome day on the ice.Gooƒè bite and lots of action.Ice is hard as a rock this morning.Put my scratchers out on the sled to save my sliders.Still have a foot or so of frozen slush and looks like 24" of real good ice.So will take a while yet to get rid of that yet.Pretty nice to sit out on the lake today and take it all in.Going to enjoy a couple of fantastic trout dinners.
Ice going to be out by opener ? 🤔
As long as it's out by June 13,it's all good.
I would think so. Got 6 weeks to thaw.
Definatly will be good by the.Maybe may fly hatch.lol.
Last time I was at Upper Wapesi was on my birthday June 25 and we filmed a show there. May fly were nuts.So was the fishing.Hatch always prime time.
